def diff(poly):
  return [poly[i] * (len(poly)-1-i) for i in range(len(poly)-1)]

def diff(poly):
    return [d*c for d,c in enumerate(poly[::-1]) if d][::-1]
diff=lambda s:[i*j for i,j in enumerate(s[:-1][::-1],1)][::-1]

def diff(poly):
    return [i * n for i, n in enumerate(poly[-2::-1], 1)][::-1]

def diff(poly):
    return [-i * n for i, n in enumerate(poly[:-1], -len(poly)+1)]

def diff(poly):
    return [i * x for i, x in enumerate(poly[::-1][1:], 1)][::-1]

def diff(poly):
    return [poly[i]*(len(poly)-i-1) for i in range(len(poly)-1)]
diff=lambda p:[i*f for i,f in enumerate(p[::-1])][:0:-1]

def diff(poly):
    n = len(poly) - 1
    poly = poly[:-1]
    return [x * (n - i) for i, x in enumerate(poly)]
